title: How's placement in ec campus for cse compared dsce ise
content: how's placement in pes ec for cse can I prefer this over other better ranked collages such as dsce what's the average package here

comments.body: Pes ec campus is much better than any other college in bangalore
Any idea about average cse package
Pes ec campus placements are better for sure.
Opportunities are equally given to both the campus students (RR and EC). It must be better than DSCE's ISE placements.
Thx I got MSRIT cyber security
